fullplot: Karthik (Madhavan) is frantic after the disappearance of his wife Shakti (Shalini). Told in flashbacks, the film traces their brief marriage as the couple's dreamy romance runs through the usual gamut of highs and lows.
plot: After a difficult romance in a class-divided society, the love birds find out marriage is not what they thought it would be.
title: Alai Payuthey
